page.title: 20Gartree at home
page.content:
What do people do at home? The following are some of the things people do that we have not mentioned before Keep pets_Most of us have pets and these range from mice to ponies. Gardening_Most homes have a back garden in which a variety of things happen.Some people grow vegetables to eat,some just have a lawn.Some even cook on a barbecue in the garden when the weather is good. A typical home consists of a number of rooms 3 or 4 bedrooms a kitchen a bathroom a dining room and living room.
We also do strange things like The Domesday Project and hope you have enjoyed our block.Come and see us some time. Foxton School:
